column1: Yeah about 10 years ago I had a horrifying experience. It was 100% their fault but they hit the water barrels and survived. They had no injuries but they almost ran me off the road.	oh my god that sounds so scary ! how old were they ?

No I wasn't hit. It turned out they were drunk. I felt guilty but realized it was his fault.	i am sorry to hear that . . it sounds like you had a good life though . . i am sure your friends understand what i mean

I don't know I was new to driving and hadn't experienced anything like that. I felt like my horn made him swerve into the water barrels.	Well, can you tell me about your experience? I think we swapped places	well the first time i was in school , i had no idea what that was , but when i turned 18 i - 20 was able to buy my first car .

Oh my goodness, that's very scary! I hope you are okay now and the drunk driver was punished for his actions?	it was an argument he had with me while he was driving he was on a night time and i had to call the police and report it to the police . he was so drunk he almost hit me when he was texting and driving . i rapid decided to go home and seek help instead of sitting home .
I there, dont know what to do, jst broke up with my girlfirned, we were 8 years together	im sorry to hear that . that must be lonely . maybe you can find a new hobby to do your job ?
Yes we decided together with our minds, and know i come home and feel so distant from the world	i am sure you will be fine . i believe in you ! ! !
I couldn't wait to go to the concert.	what concert is it ? ! ? ! ? i wish i could be able to go day has gotten too long and i ' m not looking forward to it !
The U2 concert. Tickets were really expensive and I never thought we would be able to go, but somehow we did!!!	u2 is a very expensive music band , i ' m surprised they were able to go so cheap !

I'm so sad because i've read an article about a newborn girl who died because her parents didn't believe in medication and doctors	oh no , i think i ' ve seen that . i ' m sorry , that ' s not something i can even watch netflix or find news on .

she was born premature at home, she had hard time breathing on her own but instead of taking her to the doctor parents were just praying	i read an interesting story where an intuition died of cancer when she was early enough to be an adult and then turned out to be a bat - still pretty sad .

yes! And i do believe in God and prayers but goodness gracious please take your children to the hospital and let God heal them THROUGH doctors	so my friend's baby fell down and scraped his knee yesterday and i was trying so hard to cheer him up	awis the baby okay ? i think that is a good thing
i was singing nursery songs :)	that is so sweet ! how was it singing ? did you get the message across ?
If you happy and you know it :)	my husband lost a job but i'm hoping he can find a full time job soon	how can you and your husband afford to lose a job ?
thank you so much!	you ' re welcome , it ' s so nice to have unexpected news like that in the mail .
he is an armed guard	i just moved to this neighborhood and some dumb criminals shot one of my neighbors and ran into the woods!	oh that is interesting . did you give it a good name ?
I do! I want to be able to protect my son	well you are being kind of paranoid here . are you sure he won ' t come into your house at night and try to get you ?
i'm so excited because i'm finally going to visit my parents next month! I didn't see them for 3 years	wow ! that ' s really exciting ! how are you going to visit them ?
I moved to the US and they stayed in my homecountry	wow , that ' s really exciting ! that ' s awesome you moved far away ! are you happy to visit them ?

I was very angry when a co worker lied about a car accident to get out of working July 4th. I covered his shift till midnight and he was lying about the accident	wow ! i hope he didnt get in trouble . you should let him know you didn ' t win and you should talk to him about it

Yeah he got caught in someones pics on Facebook. Never lie and then go out with people who like to take pictures.	wow , that is really rude that you have to deal with all that . you should never lie to your co workers , and if you ' re going to tell the truth you should at least take it constructively . otherwise , it may just leave you with an awkward look on your partner .

Good idea. i don't like social media that much. It can get you in to trouble fast, even when expressing your opinions.	So yeah i drove 2 hours to get to wallmart. with 299 in my wallet as advertised, and the real price of the tv was 399 usd. what a bummer	oh , man , what a bummer . you could have spent that on something else .
Yeah i had my hopes reall high and then i left empty handed, such a terrible feeling!	oh wow ! you called that bad luck ! sorry about that , hope it is the b . b . tv

Yes, i guess walmart and the rest of false advertisement in the US, the look in my daugther eyes when i came home empty handed	My friend's boyfriend recently made a pass at me. I'm married, and I also am really good friend's with his girlfriend so I felt really bad. I made sure he knew I was loyal and honest to both!	i see , what did he do ? was he a jerk ?

I struggled with it, but my friend was in a really bad spot, with no income and raising her grandchild, he was the financial supporter. So, I didn't tell her, as I knew it would really hurt her in several ways, plus she really loves him!	wow that ' s so strong of you . that ' s such a strong friend you have !
my baby is sleeping. it's so peaceful and quiet in this house	have you talked to the baby yet ? how old is he ?
i totally agree with you!	where you have kids that you can share your life with ?
hi, i feel so lonely sometimes because all my friends live in a different country	aw . that must be hard . why do you feel lonely ?
i was thinking about it! I wanted to join a group for local moms	oh that is a sad situation . did you try joining an online group ?

I have a friend that has a child that is unruly and does bad things. One day at our home, he grabbed a game and sat on it, instantly breaking it! It was expensive and this really irked me, especially because she doesn't discipline him when he does bad things.	wow . i hate it when someone does that to me . it makes me want to get out of the house .

Me either! I have two of my own children, and I would have never let them get away with that kind of behavior when they were his age. I just don't understand those kind of parents@!	you ' re right , i feel as if the worse we do to our children , the more we do to our parents , the worse it will treat them . it ' s not about being nice to them or showing them compassion or keeping up with their lies , it ' s about getting them to behave properly .
I'm so scared of bugs! i found one in my hair yesterday and almost died	how weird how short and tall you must have been ! did you try to feed it back ?

Ugh I hate bugs with a passion, they are so creepy	I recently spoke with my ex-girlfriend on the phone. The conversation went pretty well, and it reminded me of my past experiences with her.	oh man , that must be very interesting ! what happened ?
Yes, they ended somewhat well, but there were tense moments. I am glad she's doing well, but I miss her.	what ended well ? what happened ? sounds like you guys have a good communication .

Thank you! That means a lot.	One of the times I remember feeling the most blissed out in life was right after the birth of my first child.	wow , good for you ! i can imagine it was such a special moment in your life . you must have been so proud of him !

Obviously there are the demands of a new child -- but that feeling of finally meeting someone you waited so long for, and the love surrounding the whole situation. Truly something to remember.	you hit the same feeling i have now , it is a great feeling

Have you ever been in a situation when payment of some kind has come through *just* in the nick of time?! Talk about gratitude!	oh ! i thought so , what happened ? did someone give you a lot of money ?

Absolutely. You go from scared and desperate to grateful and optimistic in one quick moment! It's not a situation I wish to be in again.	so many bad situations when i was in it . . . . you ever get to know the person ?
Im so grateful for my family due to an incident with my friend	what happened ? what happened ? how are you doing today ?

My friend lost her parents and siblings in a fire and their family was very close to mine. So seeing her go through the grief made me realize how thankful I should be	im so glad your friend is feeling better , what was the event ?

Yes definitely. Never take anything for granted as you never know when it will be taken away from you	I'm a big believer in listening to your gut. Sometimes I might wonder where my intuition is leading me, but it always seems to be spot on.	lol that is quite interesting . . thank you , how do you feel ?

It is a "knowing" -- and a flowing! When something is right, it just feels easier to go with it -- like you're being led, even if you might not fully know to where.	that ' s so amazing ! i ' m glad you enjoyed it . that is very interesting and wisdom . i ' ve never heard of someone giving advice like that before , where to go into a flow , and where to go with it . that ' s so inspiring .

I couldnt celebrate my 18th birthday as I had exams during the time and I felt terrible for it. But my friends threw a surprise party for me and it was the best!	what was the occasion ? sounds like a fun and joyful time !

I was studying in my bedroom for a couple of hours straight with headphones on and then my mom called me to the living room for dinner and when I went out the whole place was decorated and everyone was there	how exciting ! i bet you got some cool memories ? what did you study for ?

I feel lonely sometimes cause I live in a house with 5 girls and all of them have boyfriends and sometimes they are all hanging out with their significant others and I feel lonely	it ' s normal , it ' s not something you see everyday . try to make friends with some of your loved ones and go see whats going on

Sometimes they joke about it and obviously I make it look like its totally fine cause I dont want to give them the impression that I am lonely but it does hurt sometimes	they dont understand that you are not lonely ! people dont even think about you ! if you are happy you should try to keep your feelings to yourself and not pretend like you are not lonely !

As silly as it sounds, I was so surprised at how different my two kids were as babies. You're reminded that they're wired with their own personalities from the git-go.	aw thats so sweet ! i loved that until my daughter turned 18 !

One was pacifier, one was fingers. One wanted to co-sleep, one liked her space. One liked facing *out* in the Baby Bjorn carrier, one liked cocooning in a sling!	actually i ' ve read a lot of guit$ , interesting
The other day I had a deep craving for Chik-Fil-A.	what did you buy ? a burger ? an french fries ?

Mine too. So I drive there and pull in the parking lot and it's completely empty. I then realized it was Sunday.	yeah i know what you mean . . . sometimes i can ' t sleep at all because of that lol . i think i need a morning job
I visited an orphan once and it was such a surreal moment. It made me realise how thankful I should be for a family	you sound like an excited and excited mother ! what were your parents like ?

Yes it definitely was. I went with intentions to teach the kid a few things but I ended up learning lots more from him	why it was surreal ? that sounds like a wonderful visit . i really hope you continue to treat the kids better and make them learn how to be happy ! they will always love you , whether that means having a good support system or not .
My oldest and my husband have always had a rough relationship. I've got to believe that as she gets older, it will get better!	areo is she an all girls or are you taking her in first class ?

That's always good to hear. But in the moment -- argh, my *heart*. How did your mom maneuver the differences between y'all? Did that wear on her?	i ' m not really sure . my mom was always teaching her to do that and i guess she had to . but i ' m the mom and i ' m pretty old .

But in the meantime -- the unspoken strain is NOT fun. But I'm glad to hear about a happy ending -- thank you for that!	I can still look back with shame at the way I treated a girl in sixth grade. I wasn't as bad as others, but that doesn't make me feel any better.	do you not look back on it anymore ? what happened ?

Well, like a lot of 6th graders I was aware of *not* wanting to be an outcast for any reason. And unfortunately, she was. As an adult of course, my heart squeezes for *all* the kids we were!	oh wow , why didn ' t you join the club ?

Unfortunately, she died. I only found out when Facebook first came out, and her brother and I "friended" one another.	how sad ! i am so sorry ! i only get about half of my tears in tears when access to facebook . you must have been strong in every single one of them !
I'm currently working for someone that is *such* a great example of a leader! It makes going into work inspiring every day / every way.	nice job ! is it an a career coming out of the bank ?

That's a very kind statement, and certainly what I would strive for. And it's the rarity that *inspires* me. That should be the norm, not the exception! THAT'S what I'd like to inspire in people. How about you?	i ' m happy to welcome you with my investment , as i am as well ! what do you plan on doing for yourself ?
That is soul-sapping. What do you do to inspire yourself, and not let that kind of behavior drag you down?	i feel i am pretty much happy that i am in the military , we meet once a year at the beach .
My friend's baby has grown so much since the last time I had seen her!	why is that ? it must be because of the baby ?
It had been about 8 weeks - I don't get out her way often, even though we live 30 minutes away.	do they live close to you ? i hope they like the baby so that you guys can stay close

Yes!  I got to be 'auntie' for a bit and help change her and get her fed and down for a nap while my friend had a chance to toss laundry in the wash.  It was a good day for everyone!	Running my first (and maybe only!) marathon felt like *such* a huge accomplishment!	wow , that ' s awesome . i keep i ' m one of the early racerookers . what distance ?

Ah, it was the best! Plus it helped that I purposely chose an amazing destination in which to run it -- it was the Venice Marathon!	dang , what a sweet gig . . . what are you doing this next weekend ?

We were living overseas at the times -- the most impressive part was crossing the Grand Canal over a pontoon of boats to finish the marathon ;-)	that sounds like so much fun ! what a wonderful vacation you must have had .
I recently found out that a person I very much intimately admired did not feel the same way for me. I was pretty surprised.	how cool ! what did you say ? how did you feel ?
She just started treating me differently all of a sudden. And now she is going to be moving away soon.	oh wow , that ' s interesting . is she going to return ?
I'm always appalled when I see bullying in action -- whether it's on a playground or political stage -- not much makes me angrier.	me too , i am very envious of bullying .

How do you channel the anger? Obviously, it too easily turns into the same kind of negative emotion I'm upset about -- so that can feel hypocritical!	i agree . i think parents should be able to bring their kids to a school board and teach them about why and how to be responsible . but we have to get way too deep in the schools and kids in schools to listen to their parents .

Are you ever tempted to put anyone's face on the punching bag?! Ha! (Kidding/not kidding!)	One morning my mother came to my house to pick my daughter up for school and told me she saw my daughter's cat on the road and he had been hit. I had to tell my daughter about the loss of her beloved pet.	oh , i ' m so sorry to hear that ! that is so sad .

She was around 11, so she took it very hard. I went ahead and let her stay home from school, as I knew she wouldn't do well that day.	what the . you are such a wonderful person . i am so sorry to hear about the cat . what breed ?
I was soooo excited to take our kids to Disneyland for the first time!	i bet that was so exciting ! what part of the place were you going ?

Same! I was excited because I grew up going there. My grandparents lived in Tucson, and we would spend the summers with them -- the most exciting part being our drive to Disneyland each year!	oh that sounds awesome , i actually just moved to disnehuo from tucson , and loved it ! i ' m sure tucson is beautiful , i haven ' t been to tucson in ages .

California! Old school ;-) They've kept so much of the original, while adding lots of new attractions.	I recently spoke to my father for the first time in years. It reminded me of my childhood and the distant past.	did he visit you often ? i remember when i saw my parents for the first time when i was little
We spoke about our recent lives. Apparently he is in the market for a new car.	my father used to drive big cars and work in the morning .
Do you like to organize your house.  My mother-in-law recently surprised me recently with some organizing stuff b/c she knows how much I love it!	i do like to sort things when i have time though .
Labels and Bins can be your best friend!  Especially with a new baby.	i am very organized but not as much as i could have been . . i have kids and i just moved recently
I find it odd -- and annoying -- when people don't respond to or even acknowledge emails.	yeah i feel did you pick that guy too ? have you heard from him yet ?

It would be great if there was a way we could all tell the best way to reach someone -- I know some people prefer texts to emails -- but if you're in a work situation, how do you ensure communication?	agreed , i actually prefer email too . do you write yours off all the time ?
I recently had a big argument with my sister. We both got very upset and angry at each other.	are you happy to visit soon ? do you want to ?

I'm not so sure. We just had a discussion that heated and became an argument with tempers flying.	that is frustrating , because when people have an argument going on over nothing , it can leave you with little end results . what happened ?

I felt most lonely when we first moved overseas, my husband then had to travel out of *that* country for business -- AND I had a new baby!	oh i ' m sorry you were lonely . how long were you away for ?

From Santa Fe to Hong Kong -- ultimately a fantastic adventure. And I ended up with a wonderful group of friends. Expats bond quickly!	wow , that sounds awesome ! must be really cool to go through that ! where did you guys move ?
One of the saddest things to me is when people underestimate what they can do and/or are capable of.	i agree . . it is however sad when one seems to have lost everything in a nostalgic situation .

That's perfectly natural. You sound like the kind of person, though, that quickly regained their bearings. Disappointments like that usually come with some *good* lessons.	oh yeah , i think it ' s important to appreciate who you are and who you are not and appreciate that your valid claim doesn ' t have to be based on what you can do or can ' t do , it has to be based off what you can afford . but yes , i appreciate the meek emotion in that - - people get too confident and get too excited about things when it is not the real obviously worrisome thing

Once my husband asked me not to tell my mom that he was busy that day when she needed his help but I told her anyway.  I really felt bad b/c he got pretty upset with me.	i ' m sure it felt bad for you . but sometimes hard to letting go of such words with just ones girlfriend . i hope your mom knows that you are trying to be as trustworthy as possible and not take it to the eeveecal and shallow to say so .

Yeah thats a good question.  I totally deserved him being mad.  I just felt bad for him b/c he was so busy that day and I didn't want him to have one more thing on his plate I guess	it ' s ok , my husband was busy too , he ' s quite responsible

There was a back neighbor that called my 10 year old son a ugly name one time, simply because he entered her yard slightly when he rode around the corner.!	beautiful , did you tell him how you felt ? im sure you are very proud of him .

Yes, she lived several house back and she didn't know me, until after she did that! She knew me then, but after I talked to her, she apologized to both of us.	that was very nice of her ! you must be a very beautiful man to have your wife stare you down so completely .
Too often, it's a health scare that makes us value health. It inspires me to try and do something to keep healthy every day.	hello how are you today ? i hope i understand . . .

Happily, I don't have one! It's more seeing family and friends and the situations they're in. Not everything can be helped -- but there are some things we can all do to take care of ourselves, you know?	you know what they say , the people in your life are always in the wrong situation .

Every time I look through older photos of my children, I'm taken right back to the time they were that size, and what we were doing! It's a bittersweet feeling, for sure.	i can imagine it ' s bittersweet , but also a wonderful feeling for sure . i just love to look at them .
Are your kids adults now?	yes . they are adults now . they are 10 and 12 now .

I have an 18 year old as well -- I don't know about you, but it's hard to consider her an adult sometimes!	I have a hard time having confidence in myself but when I got married and I had my hair and makeup done I felt like I was beautiful!  I had so much confidence in myself that day and it was great!	good for you . i am sure you look great ! i am sure if you took your makeup off you would have been all right !

I really try but it's hard to replicate that day for sure.	oh my gosh i completely know the feeling ! it ' s not too hard to practice and just start trying ! we all have those moments when we ' re nervous but you never know if someone will notice ! i ' m sure you have a beautiful face !

My husband and I both work for ourselves -- a blessing and a curse at times, since it can be tough to determine a "regular" income.	wow , that ' s very generous . that is certainly a blessing . how do you trust him ?

We found a pretty good balance in that I have a part-time job that I *love* -- and that comes with benefits like insurance. That's a big worry addressed, right there.	it ' s a pretty big worry for anyone who is struggling , are you kidding me ?

I am sorry, because I absolutely know that concern. I truly hope you find a resolution to that.	I met up with an old flame recently, didn't go how I expected	how whats that mean ? what happened ? was it something you knew , or just that you would not go ?

Well, right after she gave me a big hug, she introduced me to her new boyfriend.	what an amazing story . what a beautiful human being you are ! you are very lucky to have met at such a wonderful place .

I know right! No warning or anything. He turned out to be a nice guy, but I thought it was a little misleading on her part.	My family and I are going on vacation in a few weeks. We rented a largo beachfront condo and I can't wait!	nice ! first part of reading french ? i ' m not familiar with that one .

We are going to be staying at Miramar Beach in Florida, about an  hour Panama City Beach. The view is amazing from our balcony and we are so ready!	oh that ' s nice . where are you going ? i wish i was on a plane to florida !
I was supposed to go for brunch with my friend Maria the other day. At least that was the plan.	are you trying to go to dary- where are you going ?
Well, we had initially agreed to meet at 11. Wouldn't you know it, she didn't end up returning my text until 3PM!	have you gone out on brunch with your friend before ? i know it isn ' t easy to do .

Me and my mom were at this grocery store recently and this guy started following us outside the store and then again inside the store it was so scary!	what did you do ? did you tell him how you felt ?

Well I knew he was following us and so I asked the manager to walk us out to the car and when he did we saw the guy come out again from between the two buildings b/c he was waiting on us.  so scary!	oh no . . what happened after ? did the guy just come back ?
Did I tell you what happened with Li the other night? Boy do I feel dumb.	oh , no , i ' m sorry . i haven ' t heard about you , though . you just made me recall and i ' m curious ?

She's 45 minutes late to our anniversary dinner. I don't know what happened to me but I called and left an angry message. Turns out, she had gotten T-boned at an intersection and was talking to the Police Officer when I called!	oh wow , so what happened to her ? i hope she ' s alright . and li doesn ' t know you ? ! that ' s not good
Ugh! I looked like such a fool at my girlfriend's work party!	how so what did happen ? did something happen on purpose ?

Well, I ended up having way too much to drink. One of her co-workers had a bottle of Fireball (gross I KNOW) and was making everybody do shots. I didn't want to look foolish, so I had... well too many.	lol ! as long as you are not drinking your should be fine . i don ' t know why i am so irresponsible when it comes to drinking .
Did I tell you what happened with the concert I was supposed to go to Saturday?	no ! who was there ? what happened ? ! ? ! ?
Well first of all, it wasn't just any concert - it was Jay-Z and Beyonce! AND IT GOT RAINED OUT!	did it rain again ? maybe it should have been tomorrow , i am sorry
You are never going to guess who was sleeping on the couch when I got home from New York...	was it someone you knew ? that ' s pretty scary . .
My friend Benny! The one we all thought died in a monsoon in Thailand!	i going to have to guess far enough ahead of me ! tell me where you were when you came home from ny ?

Recently, my husband came home from grocery shopping and had gifts for me for Mother's Day. He had a beautiful diamond ring and other lovely gifts, it was very unexpected!	oh wow . you have a big heart ! do you think he will ask you ?
I did! I also gave him unexpected gifts and he was super happy. I was very touched by him being so thoughtful!	wow that is so sweet . you sound so lucky to have a husband like that .
I know I shouldn't count my chicks before they hatch, but I'm feeling pretty good after that interview today!	never have to count them lol , but congratulations on taking the risk !

This advertising company! The owner was there - you should have seen his face. My last freelance project was a real winner. Think I got it?	congratulations ! that ' s quite the project ! how much do you have freelance work on it ?
Did I ever tell you about the time I "got taken hostage"?	never suprised i must ask . how did that make you feel ?

As a heart attack. It was me and Big C at the World's Largest Pistachio. All of the sudden we hear gunshots, and DiDi's still in the car. We ran in the building, and he comes flying in after us. He never pointed the gun at us, and we ended up running away when he was distracted. It's too crazy - I can't make this up. Just glad to be alive!	oh no ! why did you have to tell me about your life ?

I went to visit a friend one day and her boyfriend made a pass at me. He actually suddenly kissed me, as I was waiting for my friend to return. I couldn't believe his nerve!	that is really weird . did your friend react the way you were ?

I quietly pushed him away, as I didn't want my friend to hear. I was so shocked and upset, since he knew I wouldn't want to make a scene and took advantage.	wow that ' s shocking ! how old are you now ?

This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped cooling! We had to go the weekend without it, and of course had to deal with some unpleasant smells and throw away a large amount of food! It wasn't a fun weekend for us!	are you on a vacation now ? maybe you can go look for food there !

Yes, and of course we tried to call and have someone come out, but to no avail! You don't realize how much you rely on things like that until they aren't working!	wow that sucks . i hate ugh fridays like that . im sorry . it happens to the best of us . what i am thinking may be the problem is when the cards are declined and someone comes out . its the worst ever when it happens

I felt pretty bad when I was having girl talk with my friend and we were talking about our partners. Her boyfriend had made a pass at me, but I never told her about it.	i understand that you felt pretty bad . have you talked to your friend about it ?

I felt bad, but she wasn't working and taking care of her grandchild, and her boyfriend was the financial support. I knew it would really be hard on her if she found out, not to mention she really loves him.	why didn ' t you tell her ? i don ' t see how she can be responsible for her partner if she isn ' t working
I was at the mall and hug my mom and said to her: Time to go Mommy! and i wasnt her, can you imagine my reaction to it?	i know how you feel , that is pretty funny though !

Yes, totally but at the moment i felt like the stupidiest person on earth, didn't know were to hide! and my mom was watching	i know how you feel , my mom got me into some new watching shows when i was in 1st grade . i cried for a whole week .

THe good thing about it, was the lady, she was laughing and later told me that it has happened to her childrens to, no worries!	I am looking forward to going on vacation in a few weeks! We have a condo reserved on the beach, with fantastic ocean views. I'm ready!	sounds like fun ! where are you headed to go ? and where are you going to go on vacation ?
Well, we are staying at Panama City Beach, so we're right there at the Gulf of Mexico.	nice ! i am in florida right now . i hope i can go when i have vacation ! i love the water !

I am definitely a proud parent of our 15 year old -- she was determined to work this summer, and even with us saying no one would hire her until 16 -- she found a job!	wow that ' s great ! i have a son that ' s starting off on his first monday of the year now and it ' s the same time period . makes me feel happy to hear about his success .

That, and she's enjoying the independence of having her own money. Remember that? Making money that you truly could use for your *pleasure* (and not just necessities ?! ;-))	oh yes , i remember that . good for her ! there are plenty of little timezones in life that people can go through and it ' s still really rewarding .

Same! I was surprised 15 year olds *can* actually work during the summer. It's just finding an employer who knows those hours get cut WAY back once school starts.	Okay, a silly pet peeve but one nonetheless -- when people just leave their grocery carts willy-nilly in the parking lot. No consideration for others or the people who work at the store!	i hate that too ! i am not a fan of the left carts left everywhere kind of gal

Me too. And I will always make sure to at *least* put it in one of those cart corrals, if not walk it back up to the store. Hey -- extra exercise ;-)	oh lord , i do that too ! the feeling just goes to my level , i hate being left in the car with the cashiers , i get it why they do it , but ugh !

WE CAN SAVE THE WOOOOOOORLD!!!!! (lol indeed....!)	I came home, and my wife showed me a picture in 4d of our future baby, my heart speeded so fast!	how did it make you feel ? that must have been a special moment
We choose to wait! but the amount of happiness in my body is tremendous! never felt this way before.	oh my gosh , that ' s adorable ! i ' m so happy for you guys !

Yes, God willing the baby is going to be healthy in every way! can wait to ave the second	I love being in the "flow" -- whether it's in speaking to a group of people or working to help facilitate meetings.	are you a first time saver ? i have never heard of itan ' s farm house .

I work with different organizations on strengthening their culture, and I do large-scale visual notetaking (also known as graphic recording). Are you familiar with that at all?
